amendment.description: Amendment requires the State of Arkansas to maintain the facilities transferred as a fish hatchery and provides that any other use of the property shall result in the reversion of the property to the Federal Government.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the bill as reported by the Committee on Resources, to require the State of Arkansas to maintain the facilities transfered as a fish hatchery and to stipulate that any other use of the facilities shall result in the reversion of the property to the Federal Government.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Resources amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
